CustomField.description: This field is used to fetch Location details wherein will be used in Email Templates
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(Location__r.Location_Code__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Location__r.Location_Code__c)), Location__r.Name == Location__r.Location_Code__c),"", Location__r.Location_Code__c+","+ BR()) + Location__r.ShippingStreet+ BR() + Location__r.ShippingCity+", "+Location__r.ShippingState + BR() + Location__r.ShippingPostalCode+", "+Location__r.ShippingCountry
CustomField.label: Location Details
